title: This $6 IKEA Find Will Bring So Much Holiday Spirit To Your Small Space
description: It’s small but large enough to decorate! READ MORE...
author: Olivia Harvey
excerpt: It’s small but large enough to decorate!

All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: Jeff Bukowski/ShutterstockIf you live in a small space or perhaps travel for the holidays, you might want to opt for a smaller Christmas tree alternative over a full-size tree. Or, maybe you already have a full-size tree but want to bring a bit of cheer to other rooms in your home. Whatever the case may be, IKEA’s small but festive VINTERFINT Artificial Potted Christmas Tree is one of the cutest ways to bring in holiday cheer. It’s the perfect size for tabletops or windowsills, but is still large enough to be decorated with your favorite ornaments and a single strand of twinkle lights.The mini tree stands about 21 inches tall, and the diameter of the pot it comes in is just over 4 inches, meaning you can easily pop it into a ceramic pot before decorating it. It’s also made from partially recycled plastic material and steel wire, so you can bend the boughs into shape to perfect the look.And right now, during IKEA’s winter sale, you can grab this little guy for just $6.“This tree is perfect for tabletop decorating. It has a beautiful shape and is a great size!” one IKEA shopper wrote in their review. Another person added, “I’m so pleased with the natural look and feel of this lil’ tree … I’m amazed at how many mini ornaments it can hold. I used a mix of IKEA ornaments and some others, and it’s beautiful! It’s already up and lit!”And someone else added, “This is the best mini tree I’ve ever brought. The bristles are soft, and [the] quality is strong. I’ll be getting more of these.”No matter your reason for wanting a mini artificial Christmas tree, this one from IKEA will check all your boxes. Grab one now before it sells out!

Olivia Harvey is a freelance writer and award-winning scriptwriter from outside Boston, Massachusetts. She’s a big fan of scented candles, getting dressed up, and the 2005 film adaptation of Pride and Prejudice starring Keira Knightley. You can make sure she’s doing okay via…read more

published about 1 hour ago

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

If you live in a small space or perhaps travel for the holidays, you might want to opt for a smaller Christmas tree alternative over a full-size tree. Or, maybe you already have a full-size tree but want to bring a bit of cheer to other rooms in your home. 

Whatever the case may be, IKEA’s small but festive VINTERFINT Artificial Potted Christmas Tree is one of the cutest ways to bring in holiday cheer. It’s the perfect size for tabletops or windowsills, but is still large enough to be decorated with your favorite ornaments and a single strand of twinkle lights.

The mini tree stands about 21 inches tall, and the diameter of the pot it comes in is just over 4 inches, meaning you can easily pop it into a ceramic pot before decorating it. It’s also made from partially recycled plastic material and steel wire, so you can bend the boughs into shape to perfect the look.

And right now, during IKEA’s winter sale, you can grab this little guy for just $6.

“This tree is perfect for tabletop decorating. It has a beautiful shape and is a great size!” one IKEA shopper wrote in their review. Another person added, “I’m so pleased with the natural look and feel of this lil’ tree … I’m amazed at how many mini ornaments it can hold. I used a mix of IKEA ornaments and some others, and it’s beautiful! It’s already up and lit!”

And someone else added, “This is the best mini tree I’ve ever brought. The bristles are soft, and [the] quality is strong. I’ll be getting more of these.”

No matter your reason for wanting a mini artificial Christmas tree, this one from IKEA will check all your boxes. Grab one now before it sells out!
